title: Life at the top
creator_credit: United Nations, Anne Boggan and Pierre des Bonnet
brief_description: A look at life in three highly industrialised countries in Europe: France, Romania and the United Kingdom, each of which seeks to further its national development goals through population planning. Focuses on the role of individual women, as influenced by their government’s policies, in determining family size.
